inclusion.criterion: Fulfilling the American College of Rheumatology (ACR) criteria for the classification of SLE
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Having received a stable dose of prednisolone and/or other immunosuppressive agents within 3 months of study entry
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women aged ≤ 35 years, matched those of SLE patients recruited
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not receiving any long-term medications including herbs
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of allergy to HPV vaccines
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and tested positive for HPV 16. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
